title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 22 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 22 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Ken Matthews of Pennsylvania guests. It's a sad Memorial Day where governments are not allowing commemorations, churches. CDC revision: Virus doesn't spread from surfaces. Doctors: Endless shutdown causing worse problems. NJ gift shop charged for opening thanks to Stasi-like informant. Man who taped Aubrey murder charged with it. Tara Reade lawyer calls it quits in Biden sex-assault case.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Ken Matthews. The president disarmed the left by walking the talk with hydroxychloroquine. Philadelphia Democrats admits to stuffing ballot boxes in several elections. Biden tells urban radio host that if he votes for Trump, he's not really black; talks pot. Pensacola shooting was terrorism. Is PC crippling our ability to vet people from other countries? Three reasons we should open now. The shutdown could be deadlier than the virus.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Ken Matthews recommends the National Navy UDT-SEAL Museum, in Fort Pierce, Florida. Gov. J.B. Pritzker of Illinois wants to throw business owners in jail for working. CDC reverses guidelines, now says contaminated surfaces NOT a risk for transmission, clearing way for Biden to resume sniffing women's hair without consent. Shutting down stadiums and crazy COVID MLB rules. Trump has cut illegal entry by almost 100%. Bill Nye, Al Gore and the rest of the global warming advocates have no scientific knowledge. "Experts" do not outrank the Constitution. Have a safe and meaningful Memorial Day weekend, and God bless. 


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
